Action.Name: Kontrola VATRate vůči omezením Pohody
Action.ActualValue: SQL#SELECT ISNULL( ( SELECT COUNT(GoodsInCart.ItemID) FROM GoodsInCart INNER JOIN Relations ON GoodsInCart.ItemID = Relations.ItemGUID1 AND Relations.RelationType = 'GOODSINCART' AND Relations.ItemGUID2 = '$CURRENT_ITEM[ItemID]' WHERE VATRate NOT IN ( SELECT 0 UNION SELECT CAST(Value AS FLOAT) / 100 FROM GlobalSettings WHERE Name = 'PohodaLowVAT' UNION SELECT CAST(Value AS FLOAT) / 100 FROM GlobalSettings WHERE Name = 'PohodaHighVAT' ) ), 0)
Action.NotEqualMessage: Některé položky obsahují sazbu DPH, která neodpovídá sazbám definovaným ve Stormware Pohoda.
